text_en: DSM-5 Classification xix Trauma- and Stressor-Related Disorders (141) 313.89 (F94.1) Reactive Attachment Disorder (141) Specify if: Persistent Specify current severity: Severe 313.89 (F94.2) Disinhibited Social Engagement Disorder (142) Specify if: Persistent Specify current severity: Severe 309.81 (F43.10) Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (includes Posttraumatic Stress Disorder for Children Imposed on Self, Factitious Disorder Imposed on Another) (165) Specify Single episode, Recurrent episodes
